title: Sphere Calculator (Radius, Diameter, Volume, Surface Area, Mass)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: From diameter: \( r = \frac{d}{2} \) From circumference: \( r = \frac{C}{2\pi} \) From surface area: \( r = \sqrt{\frac{A}{4\pi}} \) From volume: \( r = \sqrt[3]{\frac{3V}{4\pi}} \)
